dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent report identifies potential DDR voting influence but lacks specificity on CM and PowerHal as root causes.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is incomplete, missing the full CM → CPU → DDR → VCORE chain.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics are correctly identified, but some specific CPU frequencies are missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is mostly logical, correctly ruling out MMDVFS, but lacks depth in exploring CM and PowerHal influences.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical but could be more specific regarding CM and PowerHal adjustments.
